titles.title: Simon Wiesenthal Holocaust Education Assistance Act
Simon Wiesenthal Holocaust Education Assistance Act
To authorize the Secretary of Education to award grants to educational organizations to carry out educational programs about the Holocaust.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary:
Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Secretary of Education to award competitive grants to educational organizations to carry out proposed or existing Holocaust education programs.
Prohibits such grants from being used to supplant nonfederal funds the grantees would otherwise have used for Holocaust education programs.
